*Mantella spots whats going on outside. She drops her sandwich and goes
charging out. She starts shooting her eye lasers at intruders. Then she
looks at Quickstrike....she bends to her knees holds her arms out offering
help him* Mantella: Come on, we need to get inside. *Mantella whispers to
Quickstrike*
----- Original Message -----
From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 18, 2000 4:03 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> Quickstrike:
>
>
>
>
>
> The shots from Ramhorn hit the back of Quickstrike's legs, sending him
hard
> to the ground. He dropped Dark Mouse and screamed. He went to drag
himself.
> He was so close to the base. He reached towards Dark Mouse. He rolled to
his
> knees in great pain. He lifted his left foot, trying to stand, but up fell
> back onto his chest.
>
> He looked back to see Ramulus and Ramhorn. He groaned, then commanded,
> "Auto-guns--" He ducked as he saw three bright balls of fire from a
auto-gun
> fire at Ramhorn.
>
> He rolled his head. "Get 'er inside!" he said to Double Punch. "Don't
stall,
> don't let them Maxie's get 'er." After that, he lifted his chest. "Beast
> mode." He transformed. His lumbering claws were a mess, one twisted and
both
> singed. "Flank me, dang it!" he called to Scorponok. "Flank me!" He
> skittered to the ramp of the ship.
